how to delete an ad account

Hi! Unfortunately, you cannot delete ad accounts on NewsBreak. However, you can rename your account or create a new one if needed. For more details, you can check out this article: [How to create separate ad accounts](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/20333724725133-How-to-create-separate-ad-accounts).
why is a prompt "illegal asset" keeps appearing when i try to submit an ad

The 'illegal asset' prompt usually appears when your ad contains content that violates our Ad Policy and Standards. I recommend reviewing our Ad Policy document for detailed guidelines on what is allowed. You can find it here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
